Weberino

My Advocacy would be about the relatively small and mostly unknown video game industry in the Philippines. Schools that offer courses or programs to help individuals who are interested in video game development are second to none and I would like it to change in the near future in which video game companies in the Philippines can be recognized for a video game that they themselves made and not be recognized by the games they were involved in. So we could have a chance to tell our own stories and voices be heard through video games and not just be used for cheap outsourcing for other companies.
